isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE AND FENDERS - IC BUS - REMOVE AND INSTALL - MUD GUARDS

svcsubproc.title: Mud Guards - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 13 for Items in parentheses.

calloutgroup.callout1: 2. HEX BOLT AND FLAT WASHER (1/4-20 UNC)
5. HEX LOCK NUT AND FLAT WASHER (1/4-20 UNC)

step1.para: Remove the pan head screws and flat washers (Item 2), lockwashers and hex nuts (Item 5) securing the mud guard (Item 3) and reinforcement (Item 4) to the inside bottom edge of the fender extension (Item 1). Remove the mud guard and reinforcement, driver side shown.
Repeat procedure to remove passenger side mud guard and reinforcement.

svcsubproc.title: Mud Guards - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 13for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position the mud guard (Item 3) and reinforcement on the inside bottom edge of the fender extension (Item 1) and install pan head screw with flat washers (Item 2) through the fender extension, mud guard and reinforcement. Then install lockwashers and hex nuts (Item 5), drivers side shown. Tighten to 125 to 140 in-lbs. (14 to 16 Nm).
Repeat procedure to install passenger side mud guard and reinforcement.
